alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 06 at 6:02PM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Jefferson and Lewis counties. Greatest accumulations over central Jefferson County, and northern Lewis County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel with snow covered roads and very poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4409 7523 4415 7538 4421 7591 4414 7614 4405 7634 4386 7637 4379 7630 4377 7588 4386 7568 4398 7517 TIME Y22M01D06T2100Z-Y22M01D07T0300Z COORD...4416 7570 4424 7584 4427 7608 4415 7638 4402 7640 4399 7634 4386 7637 4387 7619 4391 7597 4404 7573 TIME Y22M01D07T0300Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
